text:
Here is what we have agreed to:
Goal: Get advice from Dr Brown on moving forward with reunification in the best interest of AD, Mom, and Dad. This includes what we should
have done differently.
Scope: Adrian should explain what he saw, express any concerns that arose from that, and allow for Mom and Dad to offer their perspectives on the
way we handled it.
Participants: Everyone who was an actual witness to the event that night- That includes: Adrain- saw, Dad- saw, and Mom- heard AD's reaction and
immediate concerns.
Deliverables: Reunification plan for Adrian and Dad. A joint discussion of proposed co-parenting guidance moving forward. Any adjustment to our
parenting plan if necessary.
How We Use: This is still a work in progress that Christine and I need to agree on since the last effort did not result in anything lasting or being
formally approved. So TBD.
Sent:02/21/2024 at 06:57 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/21/2024 at 07:17 PM)
Subject:Re: Next Steps
Message 1520 of 4024
I plan to look into it but my work is separate from your work so should not hold you back from engaging.
There is a sneaker convention on Saturday.
Sent:02/21/2024 at 07:33 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/21/2024 at 07:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Next Steps
Message 1521 of 4024

Subject:Re: Next Steps

metadata.section: Are we doing what we asked her to or not? Full stop. Nothing else. Are we doing the below?
